original_text: All the service of the sons of the Gershonites shall be at the command of Aaron and his sons, in all that they are to carry and in all that they have to do. And you shall assign to their charge all that they are to carry.
korean_text: 게르손 자손은 그들의 모든 일 곧 멜 것과 처리할 것을 아론과 그의 아들들의 명령대로 할 것이니 너희는 그들이 멜 짐을 그들에게 맡길 것이니라

sentences.original_text: All the service of the sons of the Gershonites
shall be at the command of Aaron and his sons
sentences.korean_translation: 아론과 그 아들들의 명령을 따라야 한다

sentences.original_text: in all that they are to carry
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 메어야 할 모든 것에 관하여

sentences.original_text: and in all that they have to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 해야 할 모든 일에 관하여

sentences.original_text: And you shall assign to their charge
all that they are to carry
